public boolean getFirePenTockOnSwing()

setFirePenTockOnSwing

public void setFirePenTockOnSwing(boolean firePenTockOnSwing)
Parameters:
firePenTockOnSwing - If true then PenListener.penTock(long) is called from the event dispatch thread. false by default.

setFrequencyLater

public void setFrequencyLater(int frequency)
Changes the event firing frequency. The pen collects device (tablet) data points and stores them in a buffer. The data points are taken from this buffer and fired as PenEvents at this frequency.

This method returns immediately, the change of frequency will happen after all the pending events are processed.

See Also:
addListener(PenListener), removeListener(PenListener)
